email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipping 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 5000MT of wheat from Houston to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and suggest a suitable vessel for this shipment? The laycan window is between October 20 and October 25.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 12000 and LOA of 180m, for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 45 per MT. The laycan window is confirmed for October 20 to October 25.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 45 per MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering it to USD 42 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 20 to October 25. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the rate of USD 43 per MT and the demurrage rate of USD 10,000 per day. Please confirm the laycan and send over the contract for review.

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipping 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam - Contract Details
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm the laycan window of October 20 to October 25. The contract has been sent to your email for review. Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Smith
